sourceMeaningMnemonic: The <radical>rice paddy</radical> radical and the <kanji>rice paddy</kanji> kanji are the same, making this one super easy to remember, at least meaning-wise.
meaningInfo: Just know your radicals, and you will know your kanji as well.
readingMnemonic:
To remember the reading <ja>た</ja>, we use the word "taco."

You're in the rice field... but when you lean down to examine the rice more closely, you see that it's not rice that's growing, it's a bunch of little <reading>ta</reading>cos (<ja>た</ja>), blossoming out of the ground.
readingInfo: Smell the tacos. Touch the tacos. Taste the tacos. This is definitely a very strange rice field.
